channel.title: Help needed with HDR
channel.description:
I am making a new map based off of the house in the picture but I want to get the HDR lighting to resemble this picture [img]https://www.architectinterior.net/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Private-house-near-lakeside-by-SkB-Architects_1.jpg[/img]
I am using this skybox [url]https://www.gamebanana.com/textures/3039[/url] I need the bluish soft lighting outside and the lights inside the house to look similar
But I have no clue whatsoever how to do this I usually just use LDR Any tips, suggestions, Good Tutorials, Etc.

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
You need a point entity called “color_correction” in your map or it won’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
If you could get color correction to work you would be my hero. For some reason, I can’t get it to work in ep2.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
Actually, that might be the key factor here. The whole picture has this bluish color.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
Color correction.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: BradGlockmann
item.description:
hey, you could just use the cordon tool to save yourself some time for compiling.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: Vincent_Vega
item.description:
I will experiment, trial and error, i have a separate small map i made specifically for quick compiles so i can test the lighting

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
There is an option for the ambience lighting in the light_environment settings, you can set the specific brightness and colour to make the rest of the natural light which does not come directly from the sun that bluish.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
Put lights where you think they would be and it will be all good. About the skybox, just make your own skybox or find a similar one.

Read full topic

item.title: Help needed with HDR

item.description:
I am making a new map based off of the house in the picture
but I want to get the HDR lighting to resemble this picture

I am using this skybox
https://www.gamebanana.com/textures/3039
I need the bluish soft lighting outside
and the lights inside the house to look similar

But I have no clue whatsoever how to do this

Any tips, suggestions, Good Tutorials, Etc.
